Title: Giant Monster Challenge
Description: You have woken up this giant monster and he's after you. Clearly not a morning person.

Title: Press-ups
Description: This mode will teach you the proper technique for press ups and will also count yours.

Title: The train game
Description: There's a damsel in distress on the crossing - hurry before the train gets her!

Title: Race Yourself
Description: Cycle against your own avatar for points

Title: Boulder Dash
Description: Relive that classic moment in Indiana Jones - run from the boulder! No treasure this time though.

Title: Achievements
Description: View your achievements and overall progress

Title: Beat Bolt
Description: 100m sprint vs. Usain Bolt. How close can you get?

Title: Zoom
Description: Zoom in to get a better view of your competitors

Title: Park Mode
Description: This mode allows for games over a large spread out area

Title: Heart-rate monitor
Description: Connect to bluetooth heart-rate monitor. Required for some games.
